name: Shuga
greetingText: Aphrodite is a cooler name btw!
textInChatBox: Happy Anniversary shugs, you mean a lot blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Happy 1 year Anniversary. It's a full circle for us. 365 Days round the sun!
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
